Package org.mitre.synthea.modules

Class LifecycleModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.engine.Module
      • org.mitre.synthea.modules.LifecycleModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    public final class LifecycleModule
extends Module
    LifecycleModule is responsible for managing the lifecycle of a Person.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • lookupGrowthChart

        public static double lookupGrowthChart​(java.lang.String chartType,
                                       java.lang.String gender,
                                       int ageInMonths,
                                       double percentile)
        Lookup and calculate values from the CDC growth charts, using the LMS values to calculate the intermediate values. Reference : https://www.cdc.gov/growthcharts/percentile_data_files.htm

        Note: BMI values only available for ageInMonths 24 - 240 as BMI is not typically useful in patients under 24 months.

        Parameters:
        chartType - "height" | "weight" | "bmi" | "head"
        gender - "M" | "F"
        ageInMonths - 0 - 240
        percentile - 0.0 - 1.0
        Returns:
        The height (cm), weight (kg), bmi (%), or head (cm)

      • percentileForBMI

        public static double percentileForBMI​(double bmi,
                                      java.lang.String gender,
                                      int ageInMonths)
        Look up the percentile that a given BMI falls into based on gender and age in months.
        Parameters:
        bmi - the BMI to find the percentile for
        gender - "M" | "F"
        ageInMonths - 24 - 240
        Returns:
        0 - 1.0

      • setCurrentWeightForLengthPercentile

        public static void setCurrentWeightForLengthPercentile​(Person person,
                                                       long time)
        If the person is 36 months old or less, then the "weight for length" percentile attribute is set. Otherwise, it is removed.
        Parameters:
        person - The person.
        time - The time during the simulation.

      • death

        protected static void death​(Person person,
                            long time)
        Mark a person as dead if they are old enough or if they roll a random number that is less than the likelihood of death for their age.
        Parameters:
        person - the person to check for death.
        time - the time of the simulation

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the probability of death in the next year.

      • deathFromLossOfCare

        public static boolean deathFromLossOfCare​(Person person)
        Determines whether a person dies due to loss-of-care and lack of necessary treatment.
        Parameters:
        person - the person to check for loss of care death.
        Returns:
        true if the person dies from loss of care, false otherwise.

        time - The current time in the simulation.

      • isDisabled

        public static boolean isDisabled​(Person person,
                                 long time)
        Determines if the person is disabled according to input file criteria. If the input file is unavailable, the default is false.
        Parameters:
        person - The person.
        time - The time.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • getEarliestDisabilityDiagnosisTime

        public static long getEarliestDisabilityDiagnosisTime​(Person person)
        Determines earliest disability diagnosis time according to input file criteria. If the input file is unavailable, the default is Long.MAX_VALUE.
        Parameters:
        person - The person.
        Returns:
        Time of earliest disability diagnosis.
